name: PDF Accepted on One Portal but Rejected on Another Analyzer
problemStatement: My PDF worked on one job site but is failing on this government portal. What changed?
whatUsersUsuallyDoWrong: Using PDF version 1.7 on portals that only support legacy 1.4 standards.
Failing to flatten layers or remove owner passwords/restrictions.
Not checking for font-embedding flags which cause server-side rendering errors.
